rows.label: qev085201_MSG0001
rows.name: Colonel Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0002
rows.name: You're off duty now, Iriina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Yeah. I'm always
with the team guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0003_2
rows.name:
I thought I'd grab a meal alone for a change,
but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0004
rows.name: Did you get lonely after all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0005
rows.name: Adults don't say things like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Too lonely to eat, meh?
If that's the case, leave it to Tatsu, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0007
rows.name:
Tatsu will eat
Iriina-san's share for her, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0008
rows.name: That's not what I meant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0009
rows.name: Colonel Elma's team is really amusing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0010
rows.name: Yo, if it isn't Iriina?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hey, call her Lieutenant!
Back in the Coalition Military days, she was an officer, y'know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0012
rows.name: We're all the same BLADE now, aren't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0012_2
rows.name:
Earth era[ST:wide ]―
Military ranks don't matter anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0013
rows.name: Isn't that right, Iriina?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0014
rows.name: Yeah, it's as you say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0015
rows.name:
But hey, Iriina-san
deserves respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0016
rows.name: Look, at that Gwin and the others...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0017
rows.name:
She's way more successful than us,
even being saddled with guys who are so useless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Stop it.
Engaging with them is just a waste of time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0019
rows.name: Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0020
rows.name:
There's someone even more amazing
than Iriina-neesan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0021
rows.name: Ohh, that's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Elma-sama whose popularity is soaring. Colonel at a young age,
and what's more, bringing along a little girl and a Nopon guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0023
rows.name: Right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0024
rows.name:
How can you be so successful with a lineup like that?
I wanna learn the secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0025
rows.name: Cut it out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0026
rows.name:
If it was just about me,
I was going to ignore it, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0027
rows.name:
But if you're going to insult my team members or Colonel Elma,
that's another story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0028
rows.name: I'll take you on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0029
rows.name: What are you gonna do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0030
rows.name: Interesting! Let's do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_JNK0010
rows.name: Engage

rows.label: qev085201_SEL0011
rows.name: Step forward and raise fists.

rows.label: qev085201_JNK0020
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: qev085201_SEL0021
rows.name: Watch what happens.

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0031
rows.name:
You wanna fight too?
Think you can win?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0032
rows.name:
You're surprisingly quick to fight.
I like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0033
rows.name: Starting a private fight here... I can't overlook this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Colonel, please look the other way.
I can't let these guys get away with it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Didn't I say I can't overlook it?
I'll join in too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Colonel or Lieutenant, those old titles
won't work here, we'll show you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0037
rows.name: Hey! You lot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0038
rows.name: C-Commander Vandham?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0039
rows.name:
T-They started
the fight first, so[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0040
rows.name: You moron![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0041
rows.name:
I saw the whole thing from the start.
From when you guys started picking a stupid fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0042
rows.name:
As punishment, do one hundred million push-ups right here!
I'll destroy your biceps![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well, I'm embarrassed.
It's due to my lack of proper training.

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0044
rows.name:
Still[ST:wide ]― Elma,
I was surprised to see even you joining the fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0045
rows.name: Normally I'd be the one to stop it, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0046
rows.name:
But Iriina's been an important comrade
since the Training Corps days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0047
rows.name: Colonel, you did it for my sake...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0048
rows.name:
Seriously, men...
Ugh, I hate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0049
rows.name: Iriina-san?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0050
rows.name: It's nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev085201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Vandham's business here.

rows.label: qev085201_JNK0040
rows.name: Suspicion

rows.label: qev085201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask about Iriina's condition.

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0051
rows.name: I was looking for Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0052
rows.name: Hmm? Something wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0053
rows.name:
Iriina-san, something's wrong, meh?
Try telling Tatsu, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0053_m
rows.name:
Iriina-san, something's wrong, meh?
Try telling Tatsu, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0053_f
rows.name:
Iriina-san, something's wrong, meh?
Try telling Tatsu, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0054
rows.name:
Thanks.
But I'll pass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0055
rows.name:
Right[ST:wide ]―
Talking to Tatsu wouldn't even provide temporary comfort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0056
rows.name: That's cruel, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0057
rows.name:
Well, enough about me.
More importantly, Old Man, why are you here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0058
rows.name:
Oh, right.
Elma, I was looking for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0059
rows.name: A new mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0060
rows.name:
Yeah. Native creatures have started appearing frequently
in the Grieving Plains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0061
rows.name: Landbank teams are taking casualties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0062
rows.name:
Understood.
We'll take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0063
rows.name:
Colonel Elma,
if it's alright, please take me with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0064
rows.name:
Hey hey[ST:wide ]―
Aren't you off duty today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0065
rows.name:
I got into a mood wanting to blow off steam, and
I want to work under Colonel Elma's command once in a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0066
rows.name:
Understood. Having you here is reassuring for us too.
Please get along with us well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085201_MSG0067
rows.name: Roger.[ST:wait ]
